answers.answer: I have a co-worker go through this and she ended up carrying to term. She was on bed rest pretty much the whole pregnancy though. Just make sure your doctor is aware of your concerns and maybe see if appointments could be every 3-4 weeks instead of monthly. Good luck!!

I went through this. At 13 weeks I had heavy bleeding. Thought I was going to lose the baby. But an ultrasound showed thats the bleeding was the hemorrage emptying its self. Sometimes they absorb or just leak out. Just take it as easy as you can. Drink lots rest and try not to stress.

I had spotting, bleeding and massive bleeds thru the first trimester. I had an ultrasound every time it had a bleed. I was on bed rest thru to 13 weeks. So far the second tri hasn't had nay of these problems. I hope you make I to term with your sweet baby
Thank you ladies for the support I will let you know what happens today at the obgyn's office

I'm going through it now except mine isn't so much just spotting with some tissue. I'm 6wks and 1day the baby is fine. Dr said that it won't threatens me or baby. Just let the bleeding pass. My cervix is closed and there's no sign of anything else bad going on. I have an ultrasound today also. On Tuesday baby's heartbeat was at 104 yesterday it was at 118.

My appointment went well today she found the babies heart beat and said it may clear up it may not but it wont hurt the baby unless I would have another bleeding episode and it would cause placental abruption...she also informes me that women with sch have been know to develop preeclampsia and have preterm labor

question: Well I had to go to the ER Sunday night I was having very heavy bleeding it would just pour out of me when i went pee but no cramping they did and ultra sound baby looked good measured 10wks 6days(right on schedule) was moving had a heart beat of 154 I had already been diagnosed with sch(subchorionic hemorrhage) but it has gotten bigger so now im on light activity, pelvic rest and no work for a week im still bleeding a little but not even close to as much as Sunday night and I still have no cramping I go in on thrusday to my reg obgyn for a follow up..... im really scared!! has anyone else gone through this I have been trying to read up on it but no real straight answer can be found and the only discussion groups I find are really old :(
title: Subchorionic Hemorrhage :(
